feverish.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She lay in bed, too feverish to sleep.
There was a feverish blush to his cheeks.
feverish.translation[0].definitions[1].d: very excited or worried about something
feverish.translation[0].definitions[1].e: They waited in a state of feverish anxiety for their mother to come home.
The show was about to begin and backstage there were signs of feverish activity  (=activity that is done very quickly because there is not much time).
